There is no other CEO in the world that could have kept such headstrong founders so deeply involved and still run the business so brilliantly, Page said. All told, Google Inc. has more than 60 offices in 30 countries. At this stage, the number of opportunities just vastly exceed the number of people we have at the company, said Alan Eustace , Google Inc. 's senior vice president of engineering and research.
